directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Rinse tempeh chops, pat dry, and season with garlic powder and seasoning salt to taste
Place the beaten egg replacers in a small bowl
Dredge the tempeh chops lightly in flour, dip in the egg replacer, and coat liberally with bread crumbs.
Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat
Fry the tempeh chops 5 minutes per side, or until the breading appears well browned
Transfer the chops to a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with foil.
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour
While baking, combine the cream of mushroom soup, soyalmond almond milk and white wine in a medium bowl
After the tempeh chops have baked for an hour, cover them with the soup mixture
Replace foil, and bake for another 30 minutes.
